</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	CHINA XINIYA FASHION LIMITED
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	NOTES TO THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
	&nbsp;
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	22. Capital management
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The Group's objectives for managing capital, composed of equity and cash and cash equivalents, are:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(a) To safeguard the Group's ability to continue as a going concern, so that it continues to provide returns to shareholders and benefits for other stakeholders;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(b) To support the Group's stability and growth; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(c) To provide capital for the purpose of strengthening the Group's risk management capability.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The Group actively and regularly reviews and manages its capital structure to ensure optimal capital structure and shareholders' returns, taking into consideration the future capital requirements of the Group and capital efficiency, prevailing and projected profitability, projected operating cash flows, projected capital expenditures and projected investment opportunities. The Group currently does not have a formal dividend policy. There have been no changes in the Group's capital management policies for the years ended December 31, 2013, 2014 and 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Other than as disclosed in Note 16, the Company is not subject to a capital requirements imposed by any regulators or by any other external source.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	23. Related party transactions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The Group's ultimate parent is Qiming Investment Limited (incorporated in the British Virgin Islands). The Group's ultimate controlling party is Mr.&nbsp;Qiming Xu, the Company's founder and Chief Executive Officer. In addition to the transactions and balances detailed elsewhere in the notes to the consolidated financial statements, the Group had the following transactions with related parties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	984

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">

	984
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">

<TD ID="FFCELL" VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="9%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
	835
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Property lease rental paid represents payments to an entity controlled by Mr.&nbsp;Xu's family. The lease is for ten years through December 2015 and provides for annual rent of RMB984,000, and includes a warehousing facility of 6,000 square meters, flagship outlet of 1,200 square meters, administrative areas of 4,800&nbsp;square meters and employee residential areas of 6,000 square meters.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	In December 2014, the Group signed a three-year operating lease agreement with Yi Ya (Xiamen) Accessories Limited Company, a company controlled by Ms.&nbsp;Wushe Wu, the mother of Mr.&nbsp;Qiming Xu, our founder, chairman and chief executive officer, from January&nbsp;1, 2015 to December 31, 2017 for the design and development and sales and marketing centers in Xiamen City, Fujian Province, where the Group leases approximately 1,137 square meters of office space. The lease amount is RMB273,000 per year. In 2015, the corporate headquarter moved to this new premise.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	In April 2015, the Group signed a three-year renew operating lease agreement with Jinjiang Xiniya Garments and Weaving Co., Ltd, a company controlled by Ms.&nbsp;Wushe Wu, the mother of Mr.&nbsp;Qiming Xu, the founder, chairman and chief executive officer, from May 1, 2015 to April 30, 2018 for the warehousing facility of 1,241 square meters and a flagship outlet of 316 square meters. The lease amounts are RMB119,000 per year for the warehouse and RMB233,000 per year for the flagship outlet.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	During the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2013, 2014 and 2015, compensation expenses related to shares granted to employees by Mr.&nbsp;Xu were approximately RMB1.0 million, RMB0.9 million and nil, respectively, based on the quoted market price of the Company's ADRs and estimated forfeitures. There was no unrecognized compensation cost at December&nbsp;31, 2015. See Note 5 for key management compensation disclosure.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	We evaluated events that occurred subsequent to December&nbsp;31, 2015 for disclosure in the consolidated financial statements and notes to the consolidated financial statements.

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The Company's other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the Company's auditors and the audit committee of the Company's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):

</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE ID="B986A5DC-1131-4DEE-BCA9-9E401AD72048" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN; MARGIN: AUTO" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR HEIGHT="15">
<TD WIDTH="8%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="4%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the Company's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE ID="423DC61C-E9F5-4DC9-96CD-EB6CBB688C4F" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN; MARGIN: AUTO" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">

</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the Company's internal control over financial reporting.

</P>
</TD>

	EXHIBIT&nbsp;12.2
</FONT>

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	CERTIFICATION
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	I, Chee Jiong Ng, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="CB6D0329-708C-4EC9-B4B4-D9AF29D7653D" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN; MARGIN: AUTO" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR HEIGHT="15">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="4%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	1.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;20-F of China Xiniya Fashion Limited (the "Company");
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="56BA9070-CC74-4CD5-AF59-66F54BA460FA" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN; MARGIN: AUTO" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR HEIGHT="15">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="4%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	2.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Based on my knowledge, this annual report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="6C961074-F268-4D60-9F9A-E21FA8107F60" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN; MARGIN: AUTO" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR HEIGHT="15">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="4%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	3.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this annual report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the Company as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="634CA385-649F-421E-9C3F-B065CF7DB416" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN; MARGIN: AUTO" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR HEIGHT="15">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="4%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	4.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The Company's other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the Company and have:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="F788F959-9969-4CD7-8859-656B76A4BF01" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN; MARGIN: AUTO" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">

<TD WIDTH="8%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="4%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the Company, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<FONT SIZE="2">

</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">

</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX">
<FONT SIZE="2">

</FONT>

</TD>

<TR HEIGHT="15">
<TD>
</TD>
<TD>

</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PX" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
